subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro made 38 saves before stopping Jarome Iginla and Owen Nolan in a shootout and Richard Park scored the deciding goal in the shootout for the Islanders.
snippet: Rick DiPietro made 38 saves before stopping Jarome Iginla and Owen Nolan in a shootout and Richard Park scored the deciding goal in the shootout for the Islanders.
